wrapperStyle.before: background-color:#DBEADC; border-radius: 3px 0px 0px 3px; border:1px solid #6CA870; padding-left:2px; padding-right:2px; margin-right:2px; margin-left:2px; color:#6D6D6D;
wrapperStyle.after: background-color:#DBEADC; border-radius: 0px 3px 3px 0px; border:1px solid #6CA870; padding-left:2px; padding-right:2px; margin-left:2px; margin-right:2px; color:#6D6D6D;
